title: Athlete Development and Performance Preparation Project Through Representative Co-Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Teaching Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service or In-Service Teachers. Learners are office/administrative professionals with beginner-level expertise in the science domain, participating in project-based learning using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design practical tasks that reflect exercise performance environments and competitive constraints
Learners can propose learning environment design strategies by analyzing athlete-coach interaction data
Learners can iteratively improve PBL project outcomes based on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
